speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I’m doing alright, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding the outstanding balance on your account with QuickLoans. Can you confirm your name for me?

speaker: Customer
text: It’s Jane Doe. What’s the balance?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jane. You currently owe $450. How would you like to proceed with payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I don't have that much right now. Can I set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, we can work something out. Would you prefer weekly or monthly payments?

speaker: Customer
text: Monthly would be better for me.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. We can set it up for $50 a month. Does that work for you?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, that works. When is the first payment due?

speaker: Agent
text: The first payment will be due in 30 days. I’ll send you a confirmation email.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Jane! Have a great day.
